match.title: 4th ODI
match.statusText: India won by 6 wickets (with 46 balls remaining)

image.caption: A general view of the redeveloped R Premadasa Stadium
image.longCaption: A general view of the redeveloped R Premadasa Stadium, Basnahira v Wayamba, SLC Inter-provisional limited-over tournament, Colombo, 23 January 2011

match.hoursInfo: 14.30 start, First Session 14.30-18.00 Interval 18.00-18.45, Second Session 18.45-22.15

headshotImage.longCaption: MS Dhoni player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Upul Tharanga st †Dhoni b Ashwin 51 (73b 4x4 1x6 97m) SR: 69.86

dismissalComment.html: Tharanga is stumped, Ashwin saw Tharanga skipping down the track, bowled it short, the ball didn't turn away after pitching, carried on in the same direction, Tharanga was looking for the spin and he misses the ball, he yards out of the crease, Dhoni has the ball, bails on the ground and both of Sri Lanka's openers are now dismissed

dismissalText.commentary: Lahiru Thirimanne b Ashwin 47 (69b 0x4 0x6 105m) SR: 68.11

dismissalComment.html: bowled 'im, Sri Lanka's implosion continues, Thirimanne charges down the track and looks to force the ball through the off side, the ball went straight on, doesn't spin away, he misses and that crashes into the top of leg stump

headshotImage.caption: Manoj Tiwary player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Manoj Tiwary player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Dinesh Chandimal, player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Dinesh Chandimal, player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalComment.html: Tiwary is overjoyed, as he strikes in his first over, not an exceptional delivery, was a long hop that Chandimal could have hit anywhere he wanted, Chandimal just picks out the man at square leg, he's gone for 28, a slice of luck for India

headshotImage.caption: Angelo Mathews, player page headshot cutout 2023
headshotImage.longCaption: Angelo Mathews, player page headshot cutout 2023

dismissalComment.html: Manoj Tiwary has a huge grin on his face, and why not, he's just got his second wicket, a length ball spinning away, Mathews decided it was time to get a move on, he skipped out and launched the ball towards long-off, didn't get enough power on that, long-off takes the catch

third for Tiwary! Mendis looked to reverse-sweep, he's bowled by a flighted legbreak, Tiwary can do no wrong here, send him up the order today when India bat, this is his best bowling figures in ODI and domestic one-dayers as well

Tiwary's day gets better and better, he's got his fourth now! Perera looks to clobber the ball into orbit, he hits it high but not long enough, Raina gets under it at midwicket, and does well to pouch that one, he had plenty of ground to cover, judges it perfectly

Tharanga is stumped, Ashwin saw Tharanga skipping down the track, bowled it short, the ball didn't turn away after pitching, carried on in the same direction, Tharanga was looking for the spin and he misses the ball, he yards out of the crease, Dhoni has the ball, bails on the ground and both of Sri Lanka's openers are now dismissed

bowled 'im, Sri Lanka's implosion continues, Thirimanne charges down the track and looks to force the ball through the off side, the ball went straight on, doesn't spin away, he misses and that crashes into the top of leg stump

headshotImage.caption: MS Dhoni player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: MS Dhoni player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Tillakaratne Dilshan c †Dhoni b Dinda 42 (48b 7x4 0x6 84m) SR: 87.5

dismissalComment.html: Dinda has struck, once again he bowls it short, Dilshan goes for the pull, top edges it, unlike the Tharanga top edge that went for six, this one goes nowhere, swirls to the right of Dhoni, who settles under it and collects, bye bye Dilshan

dismissalText.commentary: Mahela Jayawardene c †Dhoni b Sehwag 3 (3b 0x4 0x6 4m) SR: 100

dismissalComment.html: the part-timers get another wicket, the biggest one of the innings now, Mahela looks to scoop a full ball, ends up lobbing it towards Dhoni, who accepts, umpire doesn't take long to raise the finger and send Mahela on his way, very early in Mahela's innings to be attempting that adventurous shot, SL slip to 155 for 4

headshotImage.caption: Virender Sehwag player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Virender Sehwag player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalComment.html: Sehwag is gone, substitute Senanayake who dropped Raina in the last match takes the catch at short cover, Sehwag was looking to whip that one to leg side, a short of length ball, gets a leading edge, a diving catch, well done by the substitute

headshotImage.caption: Gautam Gambhir player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Gautam Gambhir player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalComment.html: bowled 'im, a swinging yorker homes into the base of middle stump, Gambhir was terrific in the last couple of games, he's gone for a duck, Gambhir looking to push that down the ground but misses, the famous Malinga yorker does the job

headshotImage.caption: Nuwan Pradeep player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Nuwan Pradeep player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Rohit Sharma lbw b Pradeep 4 (14b 0x4 0x6 18m) SR: 28.57

dismissalComment.html: Rohit Sharma has wasted another chance, he's gone for 4, he doesn't want to go, that should end his international career temporarily, surely, that was a length ball that was angling in, Rohit looked to work it to the leg side, he missed, hits the pads, that was going on to hit leg stump

headshotImage.caption: Manoj Tiwary player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Manoj Tiwary player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Manoj Tiwary player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Manoj Tiwary player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Manoj Tiwary lbw b Mendis 21 (38b 2x4 0x6 48m) SR: 55.26

dismissalComment.html: that looked plumb and the umpire raised his finger after quite a while. The Sri Lankans were so sure. The ball pitched middle and went straight on, Manoj Tiwary missed the sweep and that was that

batsmen.shot: off side drive on front foot
off side drive on front foot

headshotImage.caption: Manoj Tiwary player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Manoj Tiwary player page headshot cutout, 2021

commentTextItems.html: it's over, India take the series 3-1, Raina launches that over extra cover to confirm the win, superb stuff from Kohli and Raina, Raina jumps and punches the air, Kohli picks up a stump as a souvenir, shakes hands with the Sri Lankans, that is India's 400th ODI victory

commentPostTextItems.html: So, another Kohli century in a chase orchestrates an Indian victory. Dhoni is arguably the best finisher around in ODIs, and Raina has been in rich form as well, making India a formidable opponent. Dhoni's gamble of playing an extra batsman paid off, with Manoj Tiwary, astonishingly, taking four wickets.

Sri Lanka's batsmen didn't take enough singles in the middle period, getting bogged down against India's part-timers, and eventually they ended on a score which was too small to challenge a lengthy Indian batting line-up.
Ridiculous acceleration from Kohli at the end. He was 86 off 103, he finished on 128 off 119.
Now that the final game is a dead rubber, another chance for Rohit, in an inconsequential game? And resting one of the openers for Rahane?
Sid Patel: "Kohli now reads 128*, 38, 1, 106, 183, 66, 108, 133*, 21, 66 that is 850 runs in last 10 innings at an mind blowing average of 106.25."
Manju: "Dada and MSD scored 183 before they were successful captains.  Kohli has scored the magic number now we just have to wait for his turn."
Mukunth: "The fastest to reach 4000 ODI runs was Sir Viv - 88 innings.

Kohli is playing his 86th innings now and already has 3845 (as of 41st over). He still can equal Sir Viv if not break the record. However, going by his current form he will atleast be 2nd going past Greenidge who took 96 innings." Here's list of quickest to 4000 ODI runs.

Alan: "I'm a Sri Lankan fan, but this is a good series to lose! By winning this series, SL won't realize their loose ends - No good genuine spinners, No strike bowlers (can not depend on all the medium pacers) & Middle order is Weak!! Coach has lot of work ahead." Main job is for their fielding coach, they put down some shockers today.
Gaurav: "Given that we've won the series, how about some experimentation? I'd say that this merits some radical changes. Here's an unorthodox batting order:
Rahane, Gambhir, Tiwary, Dhoni, Rohit, Raina, Irfan, Umesh, Ashwin, Rahul, Dinda

I'm no fan of Rohit, but if he must play please let it be at 5. His record at that position, and that alone, is phenonemal. 4 is too high for him." I'm all for experimentation in the final game, rest Zaheer and Sehwag at least.
The things our readers notice. Venkat: "Congrats India! Incidentally both innings end with an over that conceded 18 runs."
Peyush: "who has scored the most number of centuries before playing his 100th odi?" He's also the quickest to 13th ODI centuries, in 86 innings. AB de Villiers is next.
Presentation ceremony:

Seemingly a dozen or so minor awards handed out before Virat Kohli is named Man of the Match. "It's been going well for me, just trying to keep it simple, I got set and got out in the last match, I thought about it. It always pleases a sportsperson than when we perform and the team wins. (On Malinga) Luckily, I'm strong on the leg side, he's the sort of bowler if you don't get on top of him, he can change the match. I was very disappointed with the last match as I didn't have the strike-rate to set up a platform for the side."

Mahela Jayawardene: "To control that line-up you need to pick up wicket, that's where we lacked in the last few games, dropping catches doesn't help. The wicket was a touch slow, under lights the ball does a bit, the quicks bowled well, we didn't bat well, 30-40 runs short. When you set a target like that, you set attacking fields, if you get through that initial period, it becomes easy for them. Lot of credit to Nuwan Pradeep, bowled with lot of pace, good control as well."

MS Dhoni: "The part-timers bowled really well, the pace was important and they bowled to their field. What also matters is the variations you have, Manoj was the away going spinner for us, it was a good wicket, but they bowled well for us, we requested Manoj to bowl a lot in the net sessions, if we don't get a perfect allrounder, we are comfortable playing seven batsmen. Kohli has improved a lot, once he gets set, he's someone who doesn't like to throw away his wicket, he's a very improved cricketer, very hungry to get runs. Suresh Raina also, he bats at No. 6 or 7, the time has come for him to bat at 4 or 5. The problem is, you have to see what's best for the side, the kind of finisher he is at 6 or 7. Last one or two years we haven't found anyone who can fit in his shoes. I think batsmen have taken the responsibilty, it was important that whoever got off to a start, they had to score if not a hundred, at least 80-90." A contented Dhoni taking plenty of sense there.
Here's Siddhartha Talya's match report, and there'll be plenty more coming in from Abhishek Purohit, our man in Colombo.
For now, that's it from me Siddarth Ravindran and the rest at Cricinfo. See you at the final ODI for more Rohit v Manoj and "Good old days". Goodnight!

commentTextItems.html: the records this man is piling up is astonishing, already a 1000 runs in ODIs this year, the final ball of the over is smashed to the deep midwicket boundary, scores are level
more power from Kohli, all along the ground as he hammers that to the extra cover boundary, Sri Lanka have no answer to him
'Two, two, two," Kohli shouts as he drives inside-out towards extra cover, Malinga races across and gets a boot in the way to keep Kohli to two
defended off the back foot by Kohli
Kohli is in a hurry, once more he skips down the track and launches that to the left of the bowler for four more, down to 11 now for India
a four to extra cover, jumping down the track, making a bit of room, and powers it to the extra cover boundary, a shot he played repeatedly in his 183 against Pakistan in the Asia Cup
fired down the leg side, a thin edge down towards fine leg
on the pads and that is tucked to midwicket, India 21 away now
chipped towards long-off, in the air but a controlled shot
Kohli moves onto the back foot and beyond leg stump, eases the ball to long-on for a single
full ball is worked towards deep midwicket by Raina

commentPostTextItems.html: 55 runs in the Powerplay has pretty much ended Sri Lanka's chances

commentTextItems.html: wide outside off, forced towards sweeper cover for a couple, India racing towards a series win here
full and on middle, superb shot from Kohli, gets his feet out of the way of that and slams it past square leg

dropped, Sri Lanka haven't helped themselves in this match, Kohli top-edges a pull, the ball is in the air a long time, Pradeep has plenty of time to get under that one, and he spills it, another regulation catch put down
length ball on off stump, defended to the off side

century no 13 for Kohli, he scoring one every other day it seems, short form Malinga, pulled behind square leg for four, no cuss words as he celebrates the hundred, calmly removes his helmets, twirls the bat and gives it a kiss, a big smile on his face, no anger

headshotImage.caption: Angelo Mathews, player page headshot cutout 2023
headshotImage.longCaption: Angelo Mathews, player page headshot cutout 2023

dismissalComment.html: Manoj Tiwary has a huge grin on his face, and why not, he's just got his second wicket, a length ball spinning away, Mathews decided it was time to get a move on, he skipped out and launched the ball towards long-off, didn't get enough power on that, long-off takes the catch

third for Tiwary! Mendis looked to reverse-sweep, he's bowled by a flighted legbreak, Tiwary can do no wrong here, send him up the order today when India bat, this is his best bowling figures in ODI and domestic one-dayers as well

Tiwary's day gets better and better, he's got his fourth now! Perera looks to clobber the ball into orbit, he hits it high but not long enough, Raina gets under it at midwicket, and does well to pouch that one, he had plenty of ground to cover, judges it perfectly

headshotImage.caption: Dinesh Chandimal, player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Dinesh Chandimal, player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Angelo Mathews, player page headshot cutout 2023
headshotImage.longCaption: Angelo Mathews, player page headshot cutout 2023

headshotImage.caption: MS Dhoni player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: MS Dhoni player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Tillakaratne Dilshan c †Dhoni b Dinda 42 (48b 7x4 0x6 84m) SR: 87.5

dismissalComment.html: Dinda has struck, once again he bowls it short, Dilshan goes for the pull, top edges it, unlike the Tharanga top edge that went for six, this one goes nowhere, swirls to the right of Dhoni, who settles under it and collects, bye bye Dilshan

headshotImage.caption: MS Dhoni player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: MS Dhoni player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Upul Tharanga st †Dhoni b Ashwin 51 (73b 4x4 1x6 97m) SR: 69.86

dismissalComment.html: Tharanga is stumped, Ashwin saw Tharanga skipping down the track, bowled it short, the ball didn't turn away after pitching, carried on in the same direction, Tharanga was looking for the spin and he misses the ball, he yards out of the crease, Dhoni has the ball, bails on the ground and both of Sri Lanka's openers are now dismissed

headshotImage.caption: Dinesh Chandimal, player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Dinesh Chandimal, player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Dinesh Chandimal, player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Dinesh Chandimal, player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Manoj Tiwary player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Manoj Tiwary player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Irfan Pathan player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Irfan Pathan player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Dinesh Chandimal c Pathan b Tiwary 28 (32b 2x4 0x6 36m) SR: 87.5

dismissalComment.html: Tiwary is overjoyed, as he strikes in his first over, not an exceptional delivery, was a long hop that Chandimal could have hit anywhere he wanted, Chandimal just picks out the man at square leg, he's gone for 28, a slice of luck for India

headshotImage.caption: Virender Sehwag player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Virender Sehwag player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: MS Dhoni player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: MS Dhoni player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Mahela Jayawardene c †Dhoni b Sehwag 3 (3b 0x4 0x6 4m) SR: 100

dismissalComment.html: the part-timers get another wicket, the biggest one of the innings now, Mahela looks to scoop a full ball, ends up lobbing it towards Dhoni, who accepts, umpire doesn't take long to raise the finger and send Mahela on his way, very early in Mahela's innings to be attempting that adventurous shot, SL slip to 155 for 4

headshotImage.caption: Angelo Mathews, player page headshot cutout 2023
headshotImage.longCaption: Angelo Mathews, player page headshot cutout 2023

headshotImage.caption: Angelo Mathews, player page headshot cutout 2023
headshotImage.longCaption: Angelo Mathews, player page headshot cutout 2023

headshotImage.caption: Manoj Tiwary player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Manoj Tiwary player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Angelo Mathews c Kohli b Tiwary 14 (34b 1x4 0x6 27m) SR: 41.17

dismissalComment.html: Manoj Tiwary has a huge grin on his face, and why not, he's just got his second wicket, a length ball spinning away, Mathews decided it was time to get a move on, he skipped out and launched the ball towards long-off, didn't get enough power on that, long-off takes the catch

headshotImage.caption: Manoj Tiwary player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Manoj Tiwary player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Jeevan Mendis b Tiwary 17 (16b 2x4 0x6 14m) SR: 106.25

dismissalComment.html: third for Tiwary! Mendis looked to reverse-sweep, he's bowled by a flighted legbreak, Tiwary can do no wrong here, send him up the order today when India bat, this is his best bowling figures in ODI and domestic one-dayers as well

headshotImage.caption: Manoj Tiwary player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Manoj Tiwary player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Thisara Perera c Raina b Tiwary 2 (3b 0x4 0x6 3m) SR: 66.66

dismissalComment.html: Tiwary's day gets better and better, he's got his fourth now! Perera looks to clobber the ball into orbit, he hits it high but not long enough, Raina gets under it at midwicket, and does well to pouch that one, he had plenty of ground to cover, judges it perfectly

dismissalText.commentary: Lahiru Thirimanne b Ashwin 47 (69b 0x4 0x6 105m) SR: 68.11

dismissalComment.html: bowled 'im, Sri Lanka's implosion continues, Thirimanne charges down the track and looks to force the ball through the off side, the ball went straight on, doesn't spin away, he misses and that crashes into the top of leg stump

headshotImage.caption: Gautam Gambhir player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Gautam Gambhir player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Gautam Gambhir player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Gautam Gambhir player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Gautam Gambhir b Malinga 0 (5b 0x4 0x6 3m) SR: 0

dismissalComment.html: bowled 'im, a swinging yorker homes into the base of middle stump, Gambhir was terrific in the last couple of games, he's gone for a duck, Gambhir looking to push that down the ground but misses, the famous Malinga yorker does the job

headshotImage.caption: Virender Sehwag player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Virender Sehwag player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Virender Sehwag player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Virender Sehwag player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Angelo Mathews, player page headshot cutout 2023
headshotImage.longCaption: Angelo Mathews, player page headshot cutout 2023

dismissalText.commentary: Virender Sehwag c sub (SMSM Senanayake) b Mathews 34 (29b 6x4 0x6 46m) SR: 117.24

dismissalComment.html: Sehwag is gone, substitute Senanayake who dropped Raina in the last match takes the catch at short cover, Sehwag was looking to whip that one to leg side, a short of length ball, gets a leading edge, a diving catch, well done by the substitute

dismissalText.commentary: Virat Kohli not out 128 (119b 12x4 1x6 187m) SR: 107.56

headshotImage.caption: Nuwan Pradeep player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Nuwan Pradeep player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Rohit Sharma lbw b Pradeep 4 (14b 0x4 0x6 18m) SR: 28.57

dismissalComment.html: Rohit Sharma has wasted another chance, he's gone for 4, he doesn't want to go, that should end his international career temporarily, surely, that was a length ball that was angling in, Rohit looked to work it to the leg side, he missed, hits the pads, that was going on to hit leg stump

headshotImage.caption: Manoj Tiwary player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Manoj Tiwary player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Manoj Tiwary player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Manoj Tiwary player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Manoj Tiwary lbw b Mendis 21 (38b 2x4 0x6 48m) SR: 55.26

dismissalComment.html: that looked plumb and the umpire raised his finger after quite a while. The Sri Lankans were so sure. The ball pitched middle and went straight on, Manoj Tiwary missed the sweep and that was that

dismissalText.commentary: Suresh Raina not out 58 (51b 4x4 1x6 78m) SR: 113.72

stories.title: Kohli and Raina lead India to series win
stories.subTitle: Sri Lanka v India, 4th ODI, Colombo
stories.seoTitle: Sri Lanka v India, 4th ODI, Colombo: Virat Kohli, Suresh Raina lead India to series win
stories.summary: Virat Kohli was once again the architect of a successful Indian chase, one that clinched the ODI series for India - they took an unassailable 3-1 lead in the five-match series

image.caption: Manoj Tiwary finished with four wickets
image.longCaption: Manoj Tiwary finished with four wickets, Sri Lanka v India, 4th ODI, Colombo, July 31, 2012

stories.title: Raina seeks promotion to boost Test chances
stories.subTitle: Sri Lanka v India, 4th ODI, Colombo
stories.seoTitle: Sri Lanka v India, 4th ODI, Colombo: Raina wants to move up the order to boost Test chances
stories.summary: A couple of days after winning India a game with an unbeaten fifty at No. 6, Suresh Raina has said he wants to bat higher up the order in ODIs so that he can score hundreds and make a case for a Test comeback

stories.title: Gruelling schedule takes toll on Sri Lanka
stories.subTitle: Sri Lanka v India, 4th ODI, Colombo
stories.seoTitle: Sri Lanka v India, 4th ODI: Gruelling schedule takes toll on Sri Lanka
stories.summary: Seventeen Tests and 43 ODIs since the World Cup has meant the injuries are starting to pile up for Mahela Jayawardene's side
